scripts.coveralls: truffle run coverage && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:sol
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:js:fix && yarn run lint:sol:fix
scripts.dist: truffle-flattener ./contracts/Reswap.sol |  awk '/SPDX-License-Identifier/&&c++>0 {next} 1' > ./Reswap.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ./Reswap.full.sol && mv ./__Reswap_full_sol_Reswap.bin ./Reswap.full.bin && mv ./__Reswap_full_sol_Reswap.abi ./Reswap.full.abi && rm ./*_sol_*
scripts.dist:factory: truffle-flattener ./contracts/ReswapFactory.sol |  awk '/SPDX-License-Identifier/&&c++>0 {next} 1' > ./ReswapFactory.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize ./ReswapFactory.full.sol && mv ./__ReswapFactory_full_sol_ReswapFactory.bin ./ReswapFactory.full.bin && mv ./__ReswapFactory_full_sol_ReswapFactory.abi ./ReswapFactory.full.abi && rm ./*_sol_*
